origination.label: Creator

did.abstract: One 1863 certificate stating that Thomas Cavanagh of Brooklyn, N.Y. is exempt from the Civil War draft.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single item.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Thomas Cavanagh certificate of exemption from the Civil War draft, 1863, 1977.543, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Certificate stating that Thomas Cavanagh of Brooklyn, N.Y. is exempt from the Civil War draft because he found an acceptable substitute to serve in his place. The certificate is issued from the New York State Board of Enrollment, 2nd District, and is signed by Samuel I. Maddox, Provost. It is dated September 24, 1863.
